headline: Immokalee Water & Sewer District Modernizes with Xylem Digital Solutions
summary: WASHINGTON, December 11, 2024--The Immokalee Water & Sewer District in Collier County, Fla. selected Xylem (NYSE: XYL) and Core & Main (NYSE: CNM) to advance its digital transformation initiative. The utility will soon manage meters remotely, track residential water pressure, check water quality, and more with Xylem digital solutions. The modernization will create a comprehensive water management solution that integrates potable water distribution, wastewater collection, and treatment systems.
